name: pinpoint
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 to find out or say the exact position in space or time of something: It is not possible to pinpoint precisely the time of death.
C2 to discover or describe the exact facts about something: Emergency workers at the site are still unable to pinpoint the cause of the explosion.
